get_term_averages[source]

get_term_averages(tdm)

get_term_max[source]

get_term_max(tdm)

get_top_phrases[source]

get_top_phrases(text_id, text, feature_names, tdm, size, include_input_in_tfidf)

Gets top phrase for each sentence and returns them as a list of lists

One entry for each sentence. If there are no phrases then a "none" is returned for that sentences value.

get_vec(term, dictionary, u)

average_sent_size(my_docs)

w2v_pretrained(bin_file)

merge_doc_lists[source]

merge_doc_lists(doc1, doc2)

create_tfidf[source]

create_tfidf(documents1, documents2='none')

Input: the path to and name of a files containing the list of documents to use for the tf-idf matrix creation.
